A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Decent sci-fi film had it been outside of the Star wars universe. This movie is driven by theme\, spectacle\, and characters in that order. Unfortunately this leaves many problems within the narrative. In the context of a new trilogy\, somehow this film feels like a reboot of the last rather than a sequel and disregards/ unravels story lines and mystery posed by The force awakens.
